Judul: MAINTAINING TALENTS AFTER/FOLLOWING STRATEGIC ACQUISITION (A CASE STUDY IN INDONESIAN COMPANY)
Abstrak:
According to the Economist (2006), the record in 2000 of $3.33 trillion in value of Merger & Acquisition (M&A) deals was happened. The studied data on 537 companies that over 40 percent respondents described their lose some of the key management talent that left the companies. All those facts show that M&A are a contemporary issue that today affects many companies and the more common M&A become the more important it becomes to establish successful M&A procedures.  
 

The objective of this research is to explain the M&A in Indonesian company and analyze how the management of a company maintains the talents. The methodology which is  
 

used in this research is qualitative research. The main reason for using this method is this research because researcher wants to examine the M&A and formulate the strategy in M&A to maintain the talent.  
 

The result of the analysis show: (1) The Merger and Acquisition of the three mergers was success, it is showed that all the company running well after merger. The motives that showed from the three Merger and Acquisition are product diversification; it is meaning that the M&A used to quickly gain market share in new regions and enabling rapid penetration; (2) The positive strategy that used by the companies to maintain their talent are: (a) rewarding system given both individual and group, that impact to the employee performance, (b) using global network integration and IT database for integrated system both of the M&A companies, (c) using the collaboration email system to communicate to all employees for any update on each respective area, (d) High communication from the management to employee,  
 

transparent communication and keep update the manager level for any update from the merger and acquisition and convince that no impact after merger, (e) HR directly conduct workshop for harmonization and project simplification process to avoid job duplication and over  
 

administration job also approach the new culture organization to all employees and must treat employee fair and full respect, (f) All management in M&A companies approach professionally to each other for starting the harmonization project using Workshop for  
 

Managers and Non Managers level to align with new company strategy and make several meeting on each area/department happened to discuss the new business process simplification.
